alert.note: Alert for City of Bristol; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 14 at 2:25AM EDT until July 14 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee, including the following county, Sullivan. Portions of southwest Virginia, including the following county and independent city, City of Bristol and Washington. * WHEN...Until 430 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 225 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Abingdon, Walnut Hill, Harr, Hilander Park, South Holston Dam, Lindell, Emory-Meadow View, Hunter and Morril`s Cave. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
